Articles.Content:
(Fires phaser at back of Xannari's ship, killing engines and destroying the cloaking device)

- - - Updated - - -

What?

- - - Updated - - -

Beam Junior over here, I have some nanobots that might do the trick.

- - - Updated - - -

(Injects Junior)

(Wound instantly heals)

> 
> (Fires phaser at back of Xannari's ship, killing engines and destroying the cloaking device)
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> What?

[sorry. Can't let you do that, StarFox]

This is certainly interesting... Oh, here's Sampa's personal logs! Oh this is juicy!

Goes back to the ward. Hang on, Junior... Just focus on getting well.

Leaves and goes to my temporary quarters. Every crewman and crewwoman avoiding me as I was visibly in a foul mood.

> 
> [sorry. Can't let you do that, StarFox]
> This is certainly interesting... Oh, here's Sampa's personal logs! Oh this is juicy!

Lol. What secrets are you hiding, Sampa?

- - - Updated - - -

I will pay 1000 credits if you E-mail me the personal logs!

> 
> Lol. What secrets are you hiding, Sampa?
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> I will pay 1000 credits if you E-mail me the personal logs!

You read those and you will be tried for treason...
Ya know, I'm trying REALLY hard to not die. It's harder than you think
Then I'll post them on the newsvids.

> 
> Lol. What secrets are you hiding, Sampa?
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> I will pay 1000 credits if you E-mail me the personal logs!

You'll have to wait at least 46625.7 Millennia to get them, but sure.

> 
> Ya know, I'm trying REALLY hard to not die. It's harder than you think

I injected you with nans. You are 87% healed.
lol, yeah, hey, look at it this way, at least your wound was obvious. Earlier, I was at the epicenter of an explosion!

> 
> You'll have to wait at least 46625.7 years to get them, but sure.

[Timewarp - 1000x]

> 
> Then I'll post them on the newsvids.

\*sighs\* Court-marshal, here I come

Sampa, what did you do......

- - - Updated - - -

Now Xannari can blackmail you.....

Oh... Oh man, this is... 

Why did you put that there!? That's not how it...

Oh, you were doing THAT... With... What?

Well... This is... Different...
I will NEVER tell...

Ooh, what did he write?

- - - Updated - - -

ALERT: Incoming fleet

> 
> I will NEVER tell...

I didn't know you were into that stuff...

I should probably be gathering tactical data for defending the Great Attractor... But this is fun! I'll do that later.
Leaves room in civilian clothing after leaving a note and takes a shuttle and leaves the ship, disabling most tracking devices onboard...
So, I'm still hurt. But at least i can do stuff now.

(Hacks Xannari's computer for sole purpose of viewing logs)

Oh... Oh my.... Sampa... I never would have thought....

- - - Updated - - -

How could you?

Your transpatial stealth relay has been accessed. Shall I disable it?

Oh no, let 'em read! Just keep 'em out of the important stuff.

Um... I think the fleet is here...

(Everyone is too busy viewing Sampa's logs to notice the enemy fleet blowing everything up)
\*my shuttle arrives on Xannari's station and I begin to prepare for a final suicide mission to clear my name\*

Oohh, what's this? 

(Opens file "Stuff no one should see")

Oh..... Oh my.....

> 
> \*my shuttle arrives on Xannari's station and I begin to prepare for a final suicide mission to clear my name\*

[Jesus, THAT was quick!]

Oh, computer, seal the main work chamber. I'll talk to him from in here.

Hey. Sorry about that...
